bill.title: Trial and appeals courts; increase certain filing fees.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 25-7-3, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase The General Docket Fee Assessed By The Clerk Of The Supreme Court For Appeals In Civil And Criminal Cases; To Amend Section 25-7-9, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase The Fees For Filing Complaints And Petitions In The Chancery Courts; To Amend Section 25-7-13, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase The Fee For Filing Complaints In The Circuit Courts; To Amend Section 99-19-73, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase The Standard State Assessment Imposed For Certain Felony Violations; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Fees and Salaries of Public Officers
